name: Depression The Game
description:
Depression The Game is a interactive game simulating major depression. You are joining a young man on one of his really bad days trying to handle his thoughts and survive that day... or do you?Features-The game is about 10 minutes long
-This game is not for everyone
-A short but unique experience

Developer Note
I started to develop the game when i started my bad phase 2 years ago when i was really bad I developed the game hoping to process everything i experienced bad Now it's done and i'm proud of it i have created i hope you like the game
